text: Ophthalmoblapton is a plant genus of the family Euphorbiaceae first described as a genus in 1849.Allemão e Cysneiro, Francisco Freire. 1849. Pl. Novas Brasil 4.Tropicos, Ophthalmoblapton Allemão The entire genus is endemic to eastern Brazil.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;Species # Ophthalmoblapton crassipes Müll.Arg. \- Bahia # Ophthalmoblapton macrophyllum Allemão \- Rio de Janeiro # Ophthalmoblapton parviflorum Emmerich \- Bahia # Ophthalmoblapton pedunculare Müll.Arg. \- Bahia, Minas Gerais, São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro ==References== Category:Euphorbiaceae genera Category:Euphorbioideae Category:Endemic flora of Brazil
title: Ophthalmoblapton
